name: Watching TV
description:
Well, here I am. I finally made a game. A crappy, short one about watching tv. I know that it sucks. This "game" is more of a test to see how twine works, but I thought I would share it. It will probably take you less than 30 seconds to complete it. 

Controls: Just hit the hyper links to change channels.

I plan on making a full blown rpg text adventure with some pretty unique ideas to go with it. I can't say anymore about it because I'm still brainstorming ideas. Stay tuned!
